Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - Latest Version
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 2400 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Something that's not integrated graphics and was made in the last 10 years
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes!
  • Additional Notes: If it can run Crysis it can run this (Yes I'm reviving this expired joke)
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - Latest Version
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th generation and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 will do nicely
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Still yes!
  • Additional Notes: If you can run DOTA you can run this
